    <PropertyValue>// **************************************************
// Custom code for PartForm
// Created: 7/13/2017 2:12:40 PM
// **************************************************
//
// REVISION LOG
//	01/21/22 Eric Blackwelder @ Encompass

//tweak to show difference between git pushes

extern alias Erp_Contracts_BO_Part;
extern alias Erp_Contracts_BO_PartPlantSearch;
extern alias Erp_Contracts_BO_PO;
extern alias Erp_Contracts_BO_PartOnHandWhse;
extern alias Erp_Contracts_BO_Vendor;
extern alias Erp_Contracts_BO_VendorPPSearch;

using System;
using System.ComponentModel;
using System.Data;
using System.Diagnostics;
using System.Windows.Forms;
using Erp.Adapters;
using Erp.UI;
using Ice.Lib;
using Ice.Adapters;
using Ice.Lib.Customization;
using Ice.Lib.ExtendedProps;
using Ice.Lib.Framework;
using Ice.Lib.Searches;
using Ice.UI.FormFunctions;
using Ice.UI;
using Erp.BO;
using Ice.BO;

public class Script
{
	// ** Wizard Insert Location - Do Not Remove 'Begin/End Wizard Added Module Level Variables' Comments! **
	// Begin Wizard Added Module Level Variables **

	private EpiBaseAdapter oTrans_adapter;
	// End Wizard Added Module Level Variables **

	// Add Custom Module Level Variables Here **

	public void InitializeCustomCode()
	{
		// ** Wizard Insert Location - Do not delete 'Begin/End Wizard Added Variable Initialization' lines **
		// Begin Wizard Added Variable Initialization

		this.oTrans_adapter = ((EpiBaseAdapter)(this.csm.TransAdaptersHT["oTrans_adapter"]));
		this.oTrans_adapter.BeforeAdapterMethod += new BeforeAdapterMethod(this.oTrans_adapter_BeforeAdapterMethod);
		// End Wizard Added Variable Initialization

		// Begin Wizard Added Custom Method Calls

		// End Wizard Added Custom Method Calls
		cmbgmsGauge.DropDownStyle = Infragistics.Win.UltraWinGrid.UltraComboStyle.DropDownList;
		cmbgmsMaterialType.DropDownStyle = Infragistics.Win.UltraWinGrid.UltraComboStyle.DropDownList;
	}

	public void DestroyCustomCode()
	{
		// ** Wizard Insert Location - Do not delete 'Begin/End Wizard Added Object Disposal' lines **
		// Begin Wizard Added Object Disposal

		this.oTrans_adapter.BeforeAdapterMethod -= new BeforeAdapterMethod(this.oTrans_adapter_BeforeAdapterMethod);
		this.oTrans_adapter = null;
		// End Wizard Added Object Disposal

		// Begin Custom Code Disposal

		// End Custom Code Disposal
	}

	private void oTrans_adapter_BeforeAdapterMethod(object sender, BeforeAdapterMethodArgs args)
	{
		// ** Argument Properties and Uses **
		// ** args.MethodName **
		// ** Add Event Handler Code **

		// ** Use MessageBox to find adapter method name
		// EpiMessageBox.Show(args.MethodName)
		switch (args.MethodName)
		{
			case "Update":
				// DialogResult dialogResult = EpiMessageBox.Show("Cancel Update?", "Cancel", MessageBoxButtons.YesNo);
				// if ((dialogResult == DialogResult.Yes))
				// {
				// 	args.Cancel = true;
				// } else
				// {
				// 	DoSomethingElse();
				// }

					EpiDataView edvPart = ((EpiDataView)(this.oTrans.EpiDataViews["Part"]));
					System.Data.DataRow edvPartRow = edvPart.CurrentDataRow;
					if ((edvPartRow != null))
					{
						if (edvPartRow["gmsSortCode_c"].ToString() != string.Empty)
						{
							string baqID = "gmsSortCodeUnique";
							DataSet dsPart = new DataSet();
							DynamicQueryAdapter qryPart = new DynamicQueryAdapter(oTrans);
							qryPart.BOConnect();
							QueryExecutionDataSet executionDS = qryPart.GetQueryExecutionParametersByID(baqID);
							executionDS.ExecutionParameter.Clear();
							executionDS.ExecutionParameter.AddExecutionParameterRow("vPartNum",edvPartRow["PartNum"].ToString(),"nvarchar(50)",false,Guid.NewGuid(),"A");
							executionDS.ExecutionParameter.AddExecutionParameterRow("vSortCode",edvPartRow["gmsSortCode_c"].ToString(),"nvarchar(20)",false,Guid.NewGuid(),"A");
							qryPart.ExecuteByID(baqID,executionDS);
							dsPart = qryPart.QueryResults;
							qryPart.Dispose();
							
							if (dsPart.Tables["Results"].Rows.Count > 0)
							{
								args.Cancel = true;
								MessageBox.Show("Sort Code Must be Unique.","Part - Error",MessageBoxButtons.OK,MessageBoxIcon.Error,MessageBoxDefaultButton.Button1);
								txtgmsSortCode.Focus();
							}
						}else{
							DialogResult dialogResult = EpiMessageBox.Show("Sort Code must be entered.  Should system assign Sort Code?", "Sort Code Empty", MessageBoxButtons.YesNo);
							if ((dialogResult == DialogResult.Yes))
							{
								int newSCSeq = GetSCSeq();
								if (newSCSeq >0)
								{
									edvPartRow.BeginEdit();
									edvPartRow["gmsSortCode_c"] = "EPI-" + newSCSeq.ToString();
									edvPartRow.EndEdit();
								} else{ //if (vSCSeq >0)
									args.Cancel = true;
									MessageBox.Show("Next sequence was not found.","Part - Error",MessageBoxButtons.OK,MessageBoxIcon.Error,MessageBoxDefaultButton.Button1);
									txtgmsSortCode.Focus();
								} //else if (vSCSeq >0)
							} else{
								args.Cancel = true;
								txtgmsSortCode.Focus();
							}
						} //else if (edvPartRow["gmsSortCode_c"].ToString() != string.Empty)
					} //if ((edvPartRow != null))
				break;
		}

	}

	public int GetSCSeq()
	{
		int vSCSeq = 0;
		int newSCSeq = 0;
		string whereCodeID = String.Empty;
		// Call Adapter
		Ice.Adapters.UserCodesAdapter userCodeAdapter = new UserCodesAdapter(oTrans);
		userCodeAdapter.BOConnect();
		try
		{
			userCodeAdapter.GetByID("SC");
			whereCodeID = String.Format("CodeID = '{0}'", "SC");

			System.Data.DataRow[] dr = userCodeAdapter.UserCodesData.UDCodes.Select(whereCodeID);
			if(dr.Length == 1 && !String.IsNullOrEmpty(dr[0]["CodeDesc"].ToString()) )
			{
				vSCSeq = Convert.ToInt32(dr[0]["CodeDesc"]);
				newSCSeq = vSCSeq + 1;
				dr[0]["CodeDesc"] = newSCSeq.ToString();

				userCodeAdapter.Update();
			}else{
				newSCSeq = 0;
			}
		}
		catch(Exception ex)
		{
			newSCSeq = 0;
		}

		userCodeAdapter.Dispose();

//		Ice.Adapters.UserCodesAdapter userCodeAdapter = new UserCodesAdapter(oTrans);
//		userCodeAdapter.BOConnect();
//		SearchOptions opts  = new SearchOptions(SearchMode.AutoSearch);
//		opts.DataSetMode = DataSetMode.RowsDataSet;
//		opts.PreLoadSearchFilter = "CodeTypeID = 'SC' and CodeID = 'SC'";
//		opts.SelectMode =  SelectMode.SingleSelect;
//		userCodeAdapter.InvokeSearch(opts);
//		if (userCodeAdapter.UserCodesData.UDCodes.Rows.Count > 0)
//		{
//			vSCSeq = Convert.ToInt32(userCodeAdapter.UserCodesData.UDCodes.Rows[0]["CodeDesc"]);
//			newSCSeq = vSCSeq + 1;
//			userCodeAdapter.UserCodesData.UDCodes.Rows[0]["CodeDesc"] = newSCSeq.ToString();
//			
//			userCodeAdapter.Update();
//		}else{
//			newSCSeq = 0;
//		}
//
//		userCodeAdapter.Dispose();

		return newSCSeq;
	}
}
